definition: any of various large tropical carnivorous lizards of Africa and Asia and Australia, keep tabs on
details:
noun
- any of various large tropical carnivorous lizards of Africa and Asia and Australia
= synonyms: monitor lizard, varan
- a piece of electronic equipment that keeps track of the operation of a system continuously and warns of trouble
- electronic equipment that is used to check the quality or content of electronic transmissions
- display produced by a device that takes signals and displays them on a television screen or a computer monitor
= synonyms: monitoring device
- someone who gives a warning so that a mistake can be avoided
= synonyms: reminder, admonisher
- someone who supervises (an examination)
= synonyms: proctor
verb
- keep tabs on
= synonyms: supervise
- check, track, or observe by means of a receiver
